mapper.select: SELECT b.BRANCH_NAME, TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS SALES_DATE, i.ITEM_NAME, i.ITEM_CATEGORY, i.ITEM_PRICE, s.QUANTITY, (i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) AS TOTAL_PRICE FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID JOIN BRANCH b ON s.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY s.SALES_DATE DESC, s.SALES_ID
SELECT SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')
SELECT SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')

SELECT TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS salesMonth, SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) AS totalSales FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID GROUP BY TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY salesMonth

SELECT TO_CHAR(SALES_DATE, 'MM') AS salesMonth, b.BRANCH_REGION AS branchRegion, b.BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) AS totalSales FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID JOIN BRANCH b ON s.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO WHERE TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(SALES_DATE, 'MM'), b.BRANCH_REGION, b.BRANCH_NAME ORDER BY totalSales DESC

SELECT b.BRANCH_NO, b.BRANCH_NAME, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE b.BRANCH_NO = s.BRANCH_NO AND TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')), 0) AS DAILY_SALES, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE b.BRANCH_NO = s.BRANCH_NO AND TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM')), 0) AS MONTHLY_SALES, COALESCE((SELECT SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE b.BRANCH_NO = s.BRANCH_NO AND TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY')), 0) AS ANNUAL_SALES FROM BRANCH b
BRANCH_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchKeyword} || '%'
ORDER BY b.BRANCH_NO
ORDER BY b.BRANCH_NAME
ORDER BY MONTHLY_SALES DESC
ORDER BY MONTHLY_SALES

SELECT b.BRANCH_NO, b.BRANCH_NAME, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS "salesMonth", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS "DAILY_SALES", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') THEN i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS "MONTHLY_SALES", COALESCE(SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY), 0) AS "ANNUAL_SALES" FROM BRANCH b LEFT JOIN SALES s ON b.BRANCH_NO = s.BRANCH_NO AND TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') LEFT JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE b.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo} GROUP BY b.BRANCH_NO, b.BRANCH_NAME

SELECT TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'MM') AS "currentMonth", TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'DD') AS "salesDay", SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) AS "totalSales" FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID JOIN BRANCH b ON s.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO WHERE b.BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'MM'), TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'DD') ORDER BY "salesDay"

SELECT b.BRANCH_NO, b.BRANCH_NAME, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') THEN i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS "DAILY_SALES", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') THEN i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS "MONTHLY_SALES", COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') THEN i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY ELSE 0 END), 0) AS "ANNUAL_SALES" FROM BRANCH b JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON b.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO LEFT JOIN SALES s ON b.BRANCH_NO = s.BRANCH_NO LEFT JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID WHERE e.EMP_NO = #{empNo} GROUP BY b.BRANCH_NO, b.BRANCH_NAME

SELECT TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'MM') AS "currentMonth", TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'DD') AS "salesDay", SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) AS "totalSales" FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID JOIN BRANCH b ON s.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON b.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO WHERE e.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'MM'), TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'DD') ORDER BY "salesDay"

SELECT i.ITEM_CATEGORY, SUM(i.ITEM_PRICE * s.QUANTITY) AS totalSales, SUM(s.QUANTITY) AS totalQuantity FROM SALES s JOIN ITEM i ON s.ITEM_ID = i.ITEM_ID JOIN BRANCH b ON s.BRANCH_NO = b.BRANCH_NO JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON b.EMP_NO = e.EMP_NO WHERE e.EMP_NO = #{empNo} AND TO_CHAR(s.SALES_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM') GROUP BY i.ITEM_CATEGORY ORDER BY totalSales DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SALES (SALES_ID, BRANCH_NO, ITEM_ID, QUANTITY, SALES_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_SALES_ID.NEXTVAL, (SELECT BRANCH_NO FROM BRANCH WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}), #{itemId}, #{quantity}, #{salesDate})
